objects.text:
• Complete Apple Ecosystem
• Seamless Cross-Device Integration
• Premium Aluminum Build Quality
• Perfect for Work & Entertainment

product_details.name: Apple Premium Device Bundle - MacBook Pro, iPad & iPhone Package
product_details.description:
• Complete Apple ecosystem for seamless integration and productivity
• MacBook Pro with Retina Display and backlit keyboard
• Sleek aluminum unibody design across all devices
• iPad with stunning high-resolution display for portable computing
• iPhone featuring Touch ID and premium build quality
• macOS and iOS devices for cross-platform functionality
• Large trackpad with Multi-Touch gestures on MacBook
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and tech enthusiasts
• iCloud synchronization across all devices
• Latest wireless connectivity with WiFi and Bluetooth
• Premium build quality with durable construction
• Ideal for work, entertainment, and creative projects

banner_details:
This banner promotes a premium tech bundle in a modern, high-impact style. It features a bold announcement at the top (tagline) in vivid red to grab attention, followed by a strong, black uppercase headline (heading), highlighting the product's premium positioning. A neatly left-aligned bullet list (description) outlines key benefits, using a clean, professional font in neutral grey. Below it, urgency is established through energetic red subheadings (subheading and urgency) emphasizing time-sensitive savings. The pricing section (price) uses large, bold typography for instant visibility. A vibrant blue call-to-action button (cta_button with cta text) contrasts strongly against the background. A realistic product image (product_image) is placed to the right, enhancing visual appeal. The layout is clean and spacious, with subtle wave patterns and soft grey framing elements giving it depth and elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- Red: #FF3B30 (for headlines of urgency and promotional text)
- Blue: #007AFF (for CTA button and background design accents)
- Charcoal Black: #1D1D1F (for heading and price text)
- Cool Grey: #515154 and #A0A0A0 (for description text and border accents)
- White: #FFFFFF (main background and contrast text)
- Pale Blue (Vector accents): rgba variants of #007AFF with low opacity
product_color: The product image features Apple devices — a MacBook, iPad, and iPhone — showcasing a modern, minimalist aesthetic. The dominant color palette highlights brushed aluminum silver (#C0C0C0), glossy black (#1A1A1A), and subtle reflections from the device screens. The MacBook screen displays a serene landscape in soft sunset hues, blending lavender pink (#DDA0DD), peach rose (#FFDAB9), and sky blue (#87CEEB) for warmth and vibrance. The iPad’s and iPhone’s screens add accents of deep blue (#003366) and monochrome tones, enhancing contrast and depth. The color blending creates a sleek yet warm feel, ideal for a tech advertisement banner that emphasizes innovation and elegance.
